frontpage.frontpage_introText1: Join and help us survey Norwegian nature!

frontpage.frontpage_introText3: Want to help us ensure the quality of our sightings' data?

shared.stats_tableDescription_content: The following table shows number of observations of {{value1}} by {{value2}} in each of the categories below.
shared.stats_tableDescription_includedData: Categories without observations are omitted from the table.
shared.stats_tableDescription_includedDataExpla: A description of the data included may be found at [xxxxx]. Statistics are updated daily.
shared.stats_tableDescription_excluded: * Includes all validation categories except 'not validated (sighting not validated).'
shared.stats_tableDescription_approved: ** Has one of the following validation category:

statistics.validatedData_tableDescription: The table(s) show(s) the number of sighted taxa and the number of sightings per species group.
